recent_history.result: You engage the guards in combat, exchanging gunfire. You take 10 HP damage, and the guards retreat. Nearby machinery malfunctions due to your mana surge.
You pursue the guards through the facility, gunfire echoing. You take 5 HP damage from a ricochet. The guards flee into the Northside maintenance area, near the murmuring pipes.
Accept work order to fix murmuring pipes
Head to Northside to fix murmuring pipes
